CVXPY
Minimize
  norm_inf(x) + norm_inf(-1.0)
Subject To
Bounds
 x free
End
----------------------------------------
AFTER COMPILATION
Minimize
 Obj: +1 x_0
Subject to
 c1: -1 x_0 +1 x_1 <= +0
 c2: -1 x_0 -1 x_1 <= +0
Bounds
 x_0 free
 x_1 free
End
----------------------------------------
SCIP
Minimize
 Obj: +1 norminf_1 +1
Subject to
\   [nonlinear] <norminf_1_0>: abs((<x_0>))+<norminf_1>*(-1) <= 0;
Bounds
 x_0 free
End
